mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) TOTAL_MES FROM SIMCO_REG_CASO WHERE C_INDVIGENTE = 'A' AND C_INDAPROBADO = 'A' AND C_TIPOESTADO IN ('04','05')
SELECT COUNT(*) TOTAL_MES FROM SIMCO_REG_CASO WHERE C_INDVIGENTE = 'A' AND C_INDAPROBADO = 'A' AND C_TIPOESTADO IN ('04')
SELECT COUNT(*) TOTAL_MES FROM SIMCO_REG_CASO WHERE C_INDVIGENTE = 'A' AND C_INDAPROBADO = 'A' AND C_TIPOESTADO IN ('05')
SELECT COUNT(*) TOTAL_MES FROM SIMCO_REG_CASO WHERE D_FECHAINICIO IS NOT NULL AND C_INDVIGENTE = 'A' AND C_INDAPROBADO = 'A' AND C_TIPODIALOGO = '05' AND C_TIPOESTADO IN ('04')

SELECT COUNT(*) TOTAL_MES FROM SIMCO_REG_CASO WHERE D_FECHAINICIO IS NOT NULL AND C_INDVIGENTE = 'A' AND C_INDAPROBADO = 'A' AND C_TIPODIALOGO = '05' AND C_TIPOESTADO = '04' AND C_TIPOMECANISMO IN ('01','02')

SELECT COUNT(*) TOTAL_MES FROM SIMCO_REG_CASO WHERE D_FECHAINICIO IS NOT NULL AND C_INDVIGENTE = 'A' AND C_INDAPROBADO = 'A' AND C_TIPODIALOGO = '05' AND C_TIPOESTADO = '04' AND C_TIPOMECANISMO = '03'

SELECT COUNT(*) TOTAL_MES FROM SIMCO_REG_CASO WHERE D_FECHAINICIO IS NOT NULL AND C_INDVIGENTE = 'A' AND C_INDAPROBADO = 'A' AND C_TIPODIALOGO = '05' AND C_TIPOESTADO = '04' AND C_TIPOPARTICIPACION IN ('01','02','03','04')

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT A.C_CODIGOCASO) FROM SIMCO_REG_CASO A INNER JOIN SIMCO_REG_CASO_ACTIVIDAD B ON A.N_ID_CASO = B.N_ID_CASO INNER JOIN SIMCO_REG_ACTIVIDAD C ON B.N_ID_ACTIVIDAD = C.N_ID_ACTIVIDAD AND C.C_TIPO = 'AC' AND C.N_INDICEACTIVO = 1 WHERE A.C_INDVIGENTE = 'A' AND A.C_INDAPROBADO = 'A' AND A.C_TIPOESTADO IN ('04','05') AND C.C_TIPOVIOLENCIA IS NOT NULL

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT A.C_CODIGOCASO) FROM SIMCO_REG_CASO A INNER JOIN SIMCO_REG_CASO_ACTIVIDAD B ON A.N_ID_CASO = B.N_ID_CASO INNER JOIN SIMCO_REG_ACTIVIDAD C ON B.N_ID_ACTIVIDAD = C.N_ID_ACTIVIDAD AND C.C_TIPO = 'AC' AND C.N_INDICEACTIVO = 1 WHERE A.C_INDVIGENTE = 'A' AND A.C_INDAPROBADO = 'A' AND A.C_TIPOESTADO IN ('04','05') AND TO_CHAR(C.D_FECMODIFICACION, 'YY') = #{anhos} AND TO_CHAR(C.D_FECMODIFICACION, 'MM') = #{mes} AND C.C_TIPOVIOLENCIA IS NOT NULL

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT A.N_ID_CASO) FROM SIMCO_REG_CASO A INNER JOIN SIMCO_REG_CASO_ACTIVIDAD B ON A.N_ID_CASO = B.N_ID_CASO INNER JOIN SIMCO_REG_ACTIVIDAD C ON B.N_ID_ACTIVIDAD = C.N_ID_ACTIVIDAD AND C.C_TIPO = 'AD' AND C.N_INDICEACTIVO = 1 WHERE A.C_INDVIGENTE = 'A' AND A.C_INDAPROBADO = 'A'

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT C.N_ID_ACTIVIDAD) FROM SIMCO_REG_CASO A INNER JOIN SIMCO_REG_CASO_ACTIVIDAD B ON A.N_ID_CASO = B.N_ID_CASO INNER JOIN SIMCO_REG_ACTIVIDAD C ON B.N_ID_ACTIVIDAD = C.N_ID_ACTIVIDAD AND C.C_TIPO = 'AD' AND C.N_INDICEACTIVO = 1 WHERE A.C_INDVIGENTE = 'A' AND A.C_INDAPROBADO = 'A' AND TO_CHAR(C.D_FECMODIFICACION, 'YY') = #{anhos} AND TO_CHAR(C.D_FECMODIFICACION, 'MM') = #{mes} AND C.C_TIPO_ACTIVIDAD IN ('01','02')

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT C.N_ID_ACTIVIDAD) FROM SIMCO_REG_CASO A INNER JOIN SIMCO_REG_CASO_ACTIVIDAD B ON A.N_ID_CASO = B.N_ID_CASO INNER JOIN SIMCO_REG_ACTIVIDAD C ON B.N_ID_ACTIVIDAD = C.N_ID_ACTIVIDAD AND C.C_TIPO = 'AD' AND C.N_INDICEACTIVO = 1 WHERE A.C_INDVIGENTE = 'A' AND A.C_INDAPROBADO = 'A' AND TO_CHAR(C.D_FECMODIFICACION, 'YY') = #{anhos} AND TO_CHAR(C.D_FECMODIFICACION, 'MM') = #{mes} AND C.C_TIPO_ACTIVIDAD IN ('03','04','05')

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT C.N_ID_ACTIVIDAD) FROM SIMCO_REG_CASO A INNER JOIN SIMCO_REG_CASO_ACTIVIDAD B ON A.N_ID_CASO = B.N_ID_CASO INNER JOIN SIMCO_REG_ACTIVIDAD C ON B.N_ID_ACTIVIDAD = C.N_ID_ACTIVIDAD AND C.C_TIPO = 'AD' AND C.N_INDICEACTIVO = 1 WHERE A.C_INDVIGENTE = 'A' AND A.C_INDAPROBADO = 'A' AND TO_CHAR(C.D_FECMODIFICACION, 'YY') = #{anhos} AND TO_CHAR(C.D_FECMODIFICACION, 'MM') = #{mes} AND C.C_TIPO_ACTIVIDAD IN ('06','07')

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT C.N_ID_ACTIVIDAD) FROM SIMCO_REG_CASO A INNER JOIN SIMCO_REG_CASO_ACTIVIDAD B ON A.N_ID_CASO = B.N_ID_CASO INNER JOIN SIMCO_REG_ACTIVIDAD C ON B.N_ID_ACTIVIDAD = C.N_ID_ACTIVIDAD AND C.C_TIPO = 'AD' AND C.N_INDICEACTIVO = 1 WHERE A.C_INDVIGENTE = 'A' AND A.C_INDAPROBADO = 'A' AND TO_CHAR(C.D_FECMODIFICACION, 'YY') = #{anhos} AND TO_CHAR(C.D_FECMODIFICACION, 'MM') = #{mes} AND C.C_TIPO_ACTIVIDAD IN ('08','09','10','11','12','13','14')
SELECT COUNT(*) TOTAL_ACTIVO FROM SIMCO_REG_CASO WHERE D_FECHAPUBLICACION IS NOT NULL AND C_INDVIGENTE = 'A' AND C_TIPOESTADO IN (04,05,06)
SELECT COUNT(*) TOTAL_ACTIVO FROM SIMCO_REG_CASO WHERE C_INDVIGENTE = 'A' AND C_INDAPROBADO = 'A' AND C_TIPOESTADO = '02'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT * FROM SIMCO_REG_CASO WHERE C_TIPOESTADO = '04') A INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM SIMCO_REG_CASO WHERE C_TIPOESTADO = '05') B ON A.C_CODIGOCASO = B.C_CODIGOCASO AND B.N_VERSION = (A.N_VERSION+1)

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT * FROM SIMCO_REG_CASO WHERE C_TIPOESTADO = '05') A INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM SIMCO_REG_CASO WHERE C_TIPOESTADO = '03') B ON A.C_CODIGOCASO = B.C_CODIGOCASO AND B.N_VERSION = (A.N_VERSION+1)
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SIMCO_REG_CASO WHERE D_FECHAPUBLICACION IS NOT NULL AND C_INDVIGENTE = 'A' AND C_TIPOESTADO = '04'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SIMCO_REG_CASO WHERE D_FECHAPUBLICACION IS NOT NULL AND C_INDVIGENTE = 'A' AND C_TIPOMECANISMO = '02'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SIMCO_REG_CASO WHERE D_FECHAPUBLICACION IS NOT NULL AND C_INDVIGENTE = 'A' AND C_TIPOPARTICIPACION NOT IN ('0')

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT DISTINCT C.N_ID_CASO FROM SIMCO_REG_ACTIVIDAD A INNER JOIN SIMCO_REG_CASO_ACTIVIDAD B ON A.N_ID_ACTIVIDAD = B.N_ID_ACTIVIDAD INNER JOIN SIMCO_REG_CASO C ON B.N_ID_CASO = C.N_ID_CASO WHERE A.C_TIPO = 'AC' AND A.C_TIPOVIOLENCIA NOT IN (0) AND C.C_INDVIGENTE = 'A' AND C.D_FECHAPUBLICACION IS NOT NULL)

SELECT COUNT(C.N_ID_CASO) FROM SIMCO_REG_ACTIVIDAD A INNER JOIN SIMCO_REG_CASO_ACTIVIDAD B ON A.N_ID_ACTIVIDAD = B.N_ID_ACTIVIDAD INNER JOIN SIMCO_REG_CASO C ON B.N_ID_CASO = C.N_ID_CASO WHERE A.C_TIPO = 'AC' AND A.C_TIPOVIOLENCIA IN (01,02,03,04,05,06,07,08) AND C.C_INDVIGENTE = 'A' AND C.D_FECHAPUBLICACION IS NOT NULL

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT DISTINCT C.N_ID_CASO FROM SIMCO_REG_ACTIVIDAD A INNER JOIN SIMCO_REG_CASO_ACTIVIDAD B ON A.N_ID_ACTIVIDAD = B.N_ID_ACTIVIDAD INNER JOIN SIMCO_REG_CASO C ON B.N_ID_CASO = C.N_ID_CASO WHERE A.C_TIPO = 'AD' AND C.C_INDVIGENTE = 'A' AND C.D_FECHAPUBLICACION IS NOT NULL)

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT DISTINCT C.N_ID_CASO FROM SIMCO_REG_ACTIVIDAD A INNER JOIN SIMCO_REG_CASO_ACTIVIDAD B ON A.N_ID_ACTIVIDAD = B.N_ID_ACTIVIDAD INNER JOIN SIMCO_REG_CASO C ON B.N_ID_CASO = C.N_ID_CASO WHERE A.C_TIPO = 'AD' AND A.C_TIPO_ACTIVIDAD IN (08,09,10,11,12,13,14) AND C.C_INDVIGENTE = 'A' AND C.D_FECHAPUBLICACION IS NOT NULL)

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT DISTINCT C.N_ID_CASO FROM SIMCO_REG_ACTIVIDAD A INNER JOIN SIMCO_REG_CASO_ACTIVIDAD B ON A.N_ID_ACTIVIDAD = B.N_ID_ACTIVIDAD INNER JOIN SIMCO_REG_CASO C ON B.N_ID_CASO = C.N_ID_CASO WHERE A.C_TIPO = 'AD' AND A.C_TIPO_ACTIVIDAD IN (06,07) AND C.C_INDVIGENTE = 'A' AND C.D_FECHAPUBLICACION IS NOT NULL)

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT DISTINCT C.N_ID_CASO FROM SIMCO_REG_ACTIVIDAD A INNER JOIN SIMCO_REG_CASO_ACTIVIDAD B ON A.N_ID_ACTIVIDAD = B.N_ID_ACTIVIDAD INNER JOIN SIMCO_REG_CASO C ON B.N_ID_CASO = C.N_ID_CASO WHERE A.C_TIPO = 'AD' AND A.C_TIPO_ACTIVIDAD IN (03,04,05) AND C.C_INDVIGENTE = 'A' AND C.D_FECHAPUBLICACION IS NOT NULL)

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT DISTINCT C.N_ID_CASO FROM SIMCO_REG_ACTIVIDAD A INNER JOIN SIMCO_REG_CASO_ACTIVIDAD B ON A.N_ID_ACTIVIDAD = B.N_ID_ACTIVIDAD INNER JOIN SIMCO_REG_CASO C ON B.N_ID_CASO = C.N_ID_CASO WHERE A.C_TIPO = 'AD' AND A.C_TIPO_ACTIVIDAD IN (01,02) AND C.C_INDVIGENTE = 'A' AND C.D_FECHAPUBLICACION IS NOT NULL)
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SIMCO_REG_CASO WHERE D_FECHAPUBLICACION IS NOT NULL AND C_INDVIGENTE = 'A' AND C_INDAPROBADO = 'A' AND C_TIPODIALOGO = '05'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SIMCO_REG_CASO WHERE D_FECHAPUBLICACION IS NOT NULL AND C_INDVIGENTE = 'A' AND C_INDAPROBADO = 'A' AND C_TIPODIALOGO = '02'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SIMCO_REG_CASO WHERE D_FECHAPUBLICACION IS NOT NULL AND C_INDVIGENTE = 'A' AND C_INDAPROBADO = 'A' AND C_TIPODIALOGO = '01'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SIMCO_REG_CASO WHERE D_FECHAPUBLICACION IS NOT NULL AND C_INDVIGENTE = 'A' AND C_INDAPROBADO = 'A' AND C_TIPODIALOGO = '04'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SIMCO_REG_CASO WHERE D_FECHAPUBLICACION IS NOT NULL AND C_INDVIGENTE = 'A' AND C_INDAPROBADO = 'A' AND C_TIPODIALOGO = '03'
SELECT C_NOMCASO FROM SIMCO_REG_CASO WHERE C_INDVIGENTE = 'A' AND C_INDAPROBADO = 'A' AND C_TIPOESTADO = '06'
SELECT C_NOMCASO FROM SIMCO_REG_CASO WHERE C_INDVIGENTE = 'A' AND C_INDAPROBADO = 'A' AND C_TIPOESTADO = '02'

SELECT COUNT(A.N_ID_CASO) VALOR, B.NOMBRE_PARAMETRO NOMBRE FROM SIMCO_REG_CASO A INNER JOIN SIMCO_PARAMETRO B ON A.C_TIPOCASO = B.VALOR_PARAMETRO AND B.PADRE_PARAMETRO = 90 WHERE A.C_TIPOESTADO IN (04,05,06)
GROUP BY B.NOMBRE_PARAMETRO

SELECT COUNT(A.N_ID_CASO) VALOR, B.NOMBRE_PARAMETRO NOMBRE FROM SIMCO_REG_CASO A INNER JOIN SIMCO_PARAMETRO B ON A.C_TIPOCASO = B.VALOR_PARAMETRO AND B.PADRE_PARAMETRO = 90 WHERE A.C_TIPOESTADO IN (04) AND A.C_INDVIGENTE = 'A' AND A.C_INDAPROBADO = 'A'
GROUP BY B.NOMBRE_PARAMETRO

SELECT COUNT(A.N_ID_CASO) VALOR, B.NOMBRE_PARAMETRO NOMBRE, B.VALOR_PARAMETRO VALORPARAMETRO FROM SIMCO_REG_CASO A INNER JOIN SIMCO_PARAMETRO B
ON A.C_TIPOASUNTO = B.VALOR_PARAMETRO
ON A.C_TIPOCASO = B.VALOR_PARAMETRO
ON A.C_SUBTIPOCASO = B.VALOR_PARAMETRO
AND B.PADRE_PARAMETRO = #{tipoTipologiaCaso} WHERE A.C_INDVIGENTE = 'A' AND A.C_INDAPROBADO = 'A' GROUP BY B.NOMBRE_PARAMETRO, B.VALOR_PARAMETRO

SELECT COUNT(A.N_ID_CASO) VALOR, B.NOMBRE_PARAMETRO NOMBRE, B.VALOR_PARAMETRO VALORPARAMETRO FROM SIMCO_REG_CASO A INNER JOIN SIMCO_PARAMETRO B ON A.C_TIPOCASO = B.VALOR_PARAMETRO AND B.PADRE_PARAMETRO = #{tipoTipologiaCaso} AND A.C_TIPODIALOGO = '05' WHERE A.C_INDVIGENTE = 'A' AND A.C_INDAPROBADO = 'A' GROUP BY B.NOMBRE_PARAMETRO, B.VALOR_PARAMETRO
